Please make sure students log in to ReadWorks and complete the assigned stories. New passages have been added, including one on the Titanic and another on the three branches of government, which link closely to our class learning.
Students should also read their library books and complete the AR quizzes once finished.

ReadWorks login:

www.readworks.org/student

Class code: YU6GQ2

Password: [REDACTED] (unless already changed)

Math

Complete Additional Practice 8-7 student book and homework book.

I have added New Khan Academy lessons related to data.

Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night
 at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.

Language Arts

Complete pages 114-117 in the Grammar Workshop Book.

1 more journal

Journal tips

Make sure your journal has a clear beginning, middle, and ending. Write in full sentences and use the past tense. Add details about what you did, how you felt, and what you learned. Use time words like first, then, after that, and finally to help organize your ideas. Remember to check your spelling, punctuation, and capital letters before you finish.

Sample journal

Last weekend was busy and exciting. On Saturday, I went to the dentist with my daughter. I felt very nervous at first, but I tried to be brave. The dentist visit went well, and I felt relieved afterward. After that, my daughter and I ate some delicious food together. Then we took a walk along Cheonggyecheon Stream in Seoul and enjoyed looking at the water and walking together.
On Sunday, my wife went out, so I stayed home with my three kids. It was cold outside, so we stayed indoors and played board games and pool. We also played Blooket, and everyone laughed a lot. I had so much fun spending time with my kids.

In the end, I had a great weekend. Even though I was nervous at first, I felt happy and proud. Spending time with my family made the weekend special.
